attributes.action: make the playing of video games compulsory.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Video games are brilliant. We should play them more often. In fact it should be the law. So join me in making the playing of video games compulsory for everyone!

p.s. This isn't just because I want to become a computer games programmer, although that it is a good reason.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
